attributes.action: Give the nation the chance to a no confidence vote on the prime minister
attributes.additional_details: Because he's been proven to be a lier and we as a nation believe he's only in power because of certain mps if the nation were allowed to vote I believe he would not be prime minister he's a proven lier broke his own laws while we all stayed at home lost loved one that we weren't even allowed to say goodbye to he not fit to be prime minster
attributes.background: We as a nation should be giving the right to vote for a no confidence vote against brois Johnston as we as a nation are allowed to vote who's to be prime minister of our nation so we should have a right to vote if he has our confidence or not

rejection.details: We can't accept petitions about honours or appointments. This includes calling for Ministers or MPs to resign or be subject to a recall vote or a vote of no confidence.
